# Load necessary libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggfortify)
library(MASS)
library(stats)
library(effsize)
library(moments)
library(brunnermunzel)
library(coin)
library(dunn.test)
library(multcompView)

# Load data
codon_data <- read_csv("codon_benchmarks.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
python_data <- read_csv("python_benchmarks.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
cpp_data <- read_csv("cpp_benchmarks.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
all_data <- bind_rows(codon_data, python_data, cpp_data)

# Remove outliers function
remove_outliers <- function(data, metric) {
  data %>%
    group_by(execution_method, SIZE_CATEGORY) %>%
    filter({
      Q1 <- quantile(.data[[metric]], 0.25, na.rm = TRUE)
      Q3 <- quantile(.data[[metric]], 0.75, na.rm = TRUE)
      IQR <- Q3 - Q1
      lower_bound <- Q1 - 1.5 * IQR
      upper_bound <- Q3 + 1.5 * IQR
      .data[[metric]] >= lower_bound & .data[[metric]] <= upper_bound
    }) %>%
    ungroup()
}

# Apply outlier removal
metrics <- c("energy_consumption", "execution_time", "cpu_usage", "mem_usage")
for (metric in metrics) {
  all_data <- remove_outliers(all_data, metric)
  codon_data <- remove_outliers(codon_data, metric)
  python_data <- remove_outliers(python_data, metric)
  cpp_data <- remove_outliers(cpp_data, metric)
}

# Kruskal-Wallis test function
kruskal_wallis_test <- function(data, metric) {
  kruskal.test(as.formula(paste(metric, "~ SIZE_CATEGORY")), data = data)
}

# ANOVA test function
anova_test <- function(data, metric) {
  aov_res <- aov(as.formula(paste(metric, "~ SIZE_CATEGORY")), data = data)
  summary(aov_res)
}

# Post-hoc Dunn's Test for Kruskal-Wallis
kruskal_posthoc <- function(data, metric) {
  dunn_res <- dunn.test(data[[metric]], data$SIZE_CATEGORY, method = "bonferroni")
  data.frame(Comparison = dunn_res$comparisons, P.adj = dunn_res$P.adjusted)
}

# Post-hoc Tukey's HSD Test for ANOVA
anova_posthoc <- function(data, metric) {
  aov_res <- aov(as.formula(paste(metric, "~ SIZE_CATEGORY")), data = data)
  tukey_res <- TukeyHSD(aov_res)$SIZE_CATEGORY
  data.frame(Comparison = rownames(tukey_res), P.adj = tukey_res[, "p adj"])
}

# Perform Tests and Post-hoc Analysis
test_results <- data.frame(Metric = character(), Test_Type = character(), P_Value = numeric())
posthoc_results_list <- list()

for (metric in metrics) {
  size_data <- codon_data %>% filter(!is.na(!!sym(metric)))
  
  # Test for normality
  shapiro_res <- shapiro.test(size_data[[metric]])
  
  if (shapiro_res$p.value > 0.05) {
    # Perform ANOVA
    anova_res <- anova_test(codon_data, metric)
    test_results <- rbind(test_results, data.frame(
      Metric = metric,
      Test_Type = "ANOVA",
      P_Value = anova_res[[1]]$`Pr(>F)`[1]
    ))
    posthoc_res <- anova_posthoc(codon_data, metric)
  } else {
    # Perform Kruskal-Wallis test
    kruskal_res <- kruskal_wallis_test(codon_data, metric)
    test_results <- rbind(test_results, data.frame(
      Metric = metric,
      Test_Type = "Kruskal-Wallis",
      P_Value = kruskal_res$p.value
    ))
    posthoc_res <- kruskal_posthoc(codon_data, metric)
  }
  
  posthoc_results_list[[metric]] <- posthoc_res
}

# Save Test Results
write_csv(test_results, "analysis_results.csv")

# Save Post-hoc Results
posthoc_results <- data.frame(Metric = character(), Group1 = character(), Group2 = character(), P_Value = numeric(), Significance = character())

for (metric in names(posthoc_results_list)) {
  posthoc_res <- posthoc_results_list[[metric]]
  posthoc_res$Metric <- metric
  if (test_results$Test_Type[test_results$Metric == metric] == "ANOVA") {
    posthoc_res <- posthoc_res %>%
      separate(Comparison, into = c("Group1", "Group2"), sep = "-") %>%
      mutate(P_Value = as.numeric(P.adj),
             Significance = ifelse(P_Value < 0.05, "Significant", "Non-Significant")) %>%
      dplyr::select(Metric, Group1, Group2, P_Value, Significance)
  } else {
    posthoc_res <- posthoc_res %>%
      separate(Comparison, into = c("Group1", "Group2"), sep = " - ") %>%
      rename(P_Value = P.adj) %>%
      dplyr::mutate(Significance = ifelse(P_Value < 0.05, "Significant", "Non-Significant")) %>%
      dplyr::select(Metric, Group1, Group2, P_Value, Significance)
  }
  posthoc_results <- rbind(posthoc_results, posthoc_res)
}

write_csv(posthoc_results, "posthoc_results.csv")

# Print Results
print(test_results)
print(posthoc_results)
